briefTitle: Evaluation of the CR Plug for Repair of Defects Created at the Harvest Site From an Autograft in the Knee.
officialTitle: Evaluation of the Composite of Cancellous and Demineralized Bone Plug (CR Plug) for Repair of Defects Created at the Harvest Site During the Osteochondral Autograft Transfer System(OATS)Procedure
summary: The main objective of this study is to test the ability of an allograft plug to provide a successful repair of an osteochondral defect left at the harvest site during OATS procedure.

primaryOutcome.measure: MRI to Evaluate Success of Outcome.
